Text:
Forgot to put this in the description.

Thanks to PopArt for the original upload.

CAUTION! This is not the newest :/ doesn't work with FS9.1... But indeed a nice plane... I still use it till' it stops working... :D 

PopArt or any other gifted "seeder/releaser" : Anyone got FFS SAAB 340? I don't think it has a serious protection system... Just a serial...
I couldn't get this damn thing to start up! Thanks anyway.
I got the APU to start

Maybe this will help...in this D/L of a freeware on Avsim..it's a english manualabout the panel!!!
h**p://library.avsim.net/download.php?DLID=53370

Thanks Belga1 but that is the manual for Project Tupolev.

I also have that 1 if anyone wants it...from what I have read it is a much more realistic aircraft.

I am not sure that I have the most recent version of it though.
Thank you but it doesn't work.Not posible to start any engine.APU starting OK.It seems to be version just for P2P network from IGFLY.

There are video tutorials at the bottom of the site http://www.igfly.com/screenshots.php
like how to turn on the engines etc

How to "DISABLE AUTORUDDER ? " 
In menus : settings/realism/flightControl/Autorudder, automatically turns ON ! 
i think aircraft.cfg or panel.cfg should be edited .
